00507                         this->Text = S"MiDAS Alternative Splicing Analysis";
00508                         this->pValuesGroupBox->ResumeLayout(false);
00509                         this->fstatsGroupBox->ResumeLayout(false);

00571 private: System::Void analyzeButton_Click(System::Object *  sender, System::EventArgs *  e)
00572                  {
00573                          // require cels, gene, exon, meta files, output folder
00574                          if (String::Compare (celsFileNameTextBox->Text, S"") == 0)
00575                          {
00576                                  MessageBox::Show (S"Please select a Cel Group File", S"Error");
00577                                  return;
00578                          }
00579                          if (String::Compare (geneDataFileTextBox->Text, S"") == 0)
00580                          {
00581                                  MessageBox::Show (S"Please select a Gene Level Summary File", S"Error");
00582                                  return;
00583                          }
00584                          if (String::Compare (probesetDataFileTextBox->Text, S"") == 0)
00585                          {
00586                                  MessageBox::Show (S"Please select an Exon Level Summary File", S"Error");
00587                                  return;
00588                          }
00589                          if (String::Compare (mapFileTextBox->Text, S"") == 0)
00590                          {
00591                                  MessageBox::Show (S"Please select a Meta Probeset List", S"Error");
00592                                  return;
00593                          }
00594                          if (String::Compare (outFolderTextBox->Text, S"") == 0)
00595                          {
00596                                  MessageBox::Show (S"Please enter an Output Folder", S"Error");
00597                                  return;
00598                          }
00599                          // pass string arguments to midas code as char *
00600                          // mcppfaq_convertstr.cpp
00601                          // compile with: /clr /LD /EHsc
00602                          const char* celsFileName =
00603                                  (const char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(celsFileNameTextBox->Text)).ToPointer();
00604                          const char* geneDataFileName =
00605                                  (const char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(geneDataFileTextBox->Text)).ToPointer();
00606                          const char* probesetDataFileName =
00607                                  (const char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(probesetDataFileTextBox->Text)).ToPointer();
00608                          const char* mapFileName =
00609                                  (const char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(mapFileTextBox->Text)).ToPointer();
00610                          const char* outputDirectory =
00611                                  (const char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(outFolderTextBox->Text)).ToPointer();
00612 
00613                          // need to put log stabilization factor conversion inside a try block - might not work
00614                          bool conversionOk = false;
00615                          float logStabilize = 8.0;      // default
00616                          try
00617                          {
00618                                  logStabilize = System::Convert::ToSingle(logStabilizeTextBox->Text);
00619                                  conversionOk = true;
00620                          }
00621                          catch (System::OverflowException*)
00622                          {
00623                                  String* errMsg = S"The conversion of the log stabilization factor overflowed.";
00624                                  MessageBox::Show (errMsg, S"Error");
00625                          }
00626                          catch (System::FormatException*)
00627                          {
00628                                  String* msg1 = S"The Log Stabilization Factor ";
00629                                  String* msg2 = S" cannot be converted into a float.";
00630                                  String* errMsg = String::Concat (msg1, logStabilizeTextBox->Text, msg2);
00631                                  MessageBox::Show (errMsg, S"Error");
00632                          }
00633                          bool outputDirectoryOk = true;
00634                          if (conversionOk && strlen (outputDirectory) != 0)
00635                          {
00636                                  // create a reference to a directory
00637                                  DirectoryInfo* di = new DirectoryInfo(outFolderTextBox->Text);
00638                                  // create the directory only if it does not already exist
00639                                  if (di->Exists == false)
00640                                  {
00641                                          try
00642                                          {
00643                                                  // make sure di->Create() worked
00644                                                  outputDirectoryOk = false;
00645                                                  di->Create();
00646                                                  outputDirectoryOk = true;
00647                                          }
00648                                          catch (System::ArgumentException*)
00649                                          {
00650                                                  String* errMsg = S"The requested output directory does not specify a valid file path.";
00651                                                  MessageBox::Show (errMsg, S"Error");
00652                                          }
00653                                          catch (System::IO::IOException*)
00654                                          {
00655                                                  String* errMsg = S"The requested output directory cannot be created.";
00656                                                  MessageBox::Show (errMsg, S"Error");
00657                                          }
00658                                          catch (System::Security::SecurityException*)
00659                                          {
00660                                                  String* msg1 = S"The requested output directory could not be created.";
00661                                                  String* msg2 = S"The caller does not have the required permission.";
00662                                                  String* errMsg = String::Concat (msg1, msg2);
00663                                                  MessageBox::Show (errMsg, S"Error");
00664                                          }
00665                                  }              // end if (di->Exists == false)
00666                          }                      // end if (conversionOk && strlen (outputDirectory) != 0)
00667 
00668                          // set up the "actual" wantPvalues, based on the
00669                          // state of the object's notWantPvalues
00670                          bool wantPvalues = true;       // default
00671                          if (this->notWantPvalues)
00672                                  wantPvalues = false;
00673 
00674                          // generate pseudo command line for output file headers
00675                          String* noPvaluesString;
00676                          if (!wantPvalues)
00677                                  noPvaluesString = S" -nopvalues";
00678                          String* fstatsString;
00679                          if (this->wantFstats)
00680                                  fstatsString = S" -fstats";
00681                          String* indicesString;
00682                          if (this->wantIndices)
00683                                  indicesString = S" -indices";
00684                          String* noLogString;
00685                          if (this->noLogTransform)
00686                                  noLogString = S" -no-logtrans";
00687                          String* commandLineArray[] =
00688                          {
00689                                  S"midas -cels ", celsFileNameTextBox->Text,
00690                                          S" -genedata ", geneDataFileTextBox->Text,
00691                                          S" -probesetdata ", probesetDataFileTextBox->Text,
00692                                          S" -map ", mapFileTextBox->Text,
00693                                          S" -out-dir ", outFolderTextBox->Text,
00694                                          noPvaluesString, fstatsString, indicesString,
00695                                          S" -stabilize ", logStabilizeTextBox->Text,
00696                                          noLogString
00697                          };
00698 
00699                          // concatenate string array, convert to C++ string
00700                          String* commandLineString = String::Concat (commandLineArray);
00701                          const char* commandLineChars =
00702                                  (const char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(commandLineString)).ToPointer();
00703                          std::string commandLine = commandLineChars;
00704 
00705                          if (conversionOk && outputDirectoryOk)
00706                          {
00707                                  try
00708                                  {
00709                                          // create object to configure, run midas
00710                                          midasConfigureRun configureRun (celsFileName, geneDataFileName,
00711                                                  probesetDataFileName, mapFileName, outputDirectory,
00712                                                  wantPvalues, this->wantFstats, this->wantIndices,
00713                                                  logStabilize, commandLine, this->execVersion, this->noLogTransform);
00714                                          // configure step may return a non-fatal warning message
00715                                          bool okToRun = true;
00716                                          std::string* warningMsgstring = configureRun.configure();
00717                                          if (warningMsgstring != 0)
00718                                          {
00719                                                  String* warningMsg (warningMsgstring->c_str());
00720                                                  if (MessageBox::Show
00721                                                          (warningMsg, S"Warning", MessageBoxButtons::OKCancel)
00722                                                             != DialogResult::OK)
00723                                                  {
00724                                                          // user chose cancel - back out newly created output files
00725                                                          configureRun.deleteOutputs();
00726                                                          okToRun = false;
00727                                                  }
00728                                          }
00729                                          if (okToRun)
00730                                          {
00731                                                  // display "processing" box
00732                                                  MidasProcessingBox* processing = new MidasProcessingBox();
00733                                                  processing->Show();
00734 
00735                                                  // perform midas run
00736                                                  configureRun.run();
00737 
00738                                                  // run complete
00739                                                  // close the processing box, notify user
00740                                                  processing->Close();
00741                                                  MessageBox::Show (S"Run completed successfully.", S"Finished");
00742                                          }
00743 
00744                                  }
00745                                  catch (std::exception &e)
00746                                  {
00747                                          MessageBox::Show (e.what(), S"Error");
00748                                  }
00749                          }
00750 
00751                          Marshal::FreeHGlobal(System::IntPtr((void*)celsFileName));
00752                          Marshal::FreeHGlobal(System::IntPtr((void*)geneDataFileName));
00753                          Marshal::FreeHGlobal(System::IntPtr((void*)probesetDataFileName));
00754                          Marshal::FreeHGlobal(System::IntPtr((void*)mapFileName));
00755                          Marshal::FreeHGlobal(System::IntPtr((void*)outputDirectory));
00756                          Marshal::FreeHGlobal(System::IntPtr((void*)commandLineChars));
00757                  }
00758

00760                  {
00761                          Application::Exit();
00762                  }

00780 private: System::Void outFolderButton_Click(System::Object *  sender, System::EventArgs *  e)
00781                  {
00782                          const char* folderPath =
00783                                  (const char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(outFolderTextBox->Text)).ToPointer();
00784                          // open folder dialog box
00785                          FolderDialog dlg (folderPath);
00786                          if (dlg.DoModal() == IDOK)
00787                          {
00788                                  String* pathString (dlg.GetPathName().c_str());
00789                                  outFolderTextBox->Text = pathString;
00790                          }
00791                          Marshal::FreeHGlobal (System::IntPtr ((void*)folderPath));
00792                  }
